invocations.description: Returns the area of effect of the spell; possible values are 'None', 'Dist1', 'Dist2', 'Dist3', 'Dist4', 'Dist5', 'Dist6', 'Dist7', '1x1', '3x3', '4x4', '5x5', '6x6', 'BeamSmall', 'BeamBig', 'WaveVerySmall', 'WaveSmall', 'WaveMedium', 'WaveBig', 'Front', 'Explosion', 'GFB' and 'Wallfield'.
